hero.title: Where will you go next?
hero.description: Not sure where to start? Browse curated trip ideas by theme, month, country, or upcoming festivals. Click any itinerary to use it as a starting point.

inspirations.noResults: No results found for "{query}". Try a different keyword.

bottomCta.title: Feeling inspired?
bottomCta.description: Pick a destination and let our AI turn it into a day-by-day plan in seconds.

themes.title: Travel by Theme
themes.description: Whether you crave adrenaline-fueled adventures, immersive food trails, or serene photography escapes, find curated trip ideas that match your travel style.
themes.comingSoonDescription: Full theme pages with detailed itineraries, packing lists, and insider tips are on the way.

bestTime.title: When to Go Where
bestTime.description: Every destination has a sweet spot - the month when weather, crowds, and prices align. Use our month-by-month guide to pick the ideal time for your next trip.
bestTime.comingSoonDescription: Detailed seasonal guides with weather data, peak-season alerts, and budget tips for every month are on the way.

countries.title: Explore Destinations by Country
countries.description: From Japan's cherry blossoms to Portugal's coastal charm, dive into country-specific travel guides with best-month recommendations and local tips.
countries.comingSoonDescription: In-depth country profiles with visa info, budget breakdowns, and curated multi-city routes are on the way.

festivals.title: Plan Your Trip Around a Festival
festivals.description: The world's greatest celebrations deserve more than a last-minute flight. Discover upcoming festivals by date and build your itinerary around the event.
festivals.comingSoonDescription: Detailed festival guides with schedules, accommodation tips, and day-by-day itinerary suggestions are on the way.

weekendGetaways.title: Quick Escapes for Busy Travelers
weekendGetaways.description: You do not need two weeks off for an unforgettable trip. These short getaway ideas are built for spontaneous adventures.
weekendGetaways.comingSoonDescription: Weekend itinerary templates with train or flight options, budget estimates, and packing checklists are on the way.

country.notFoundDescription: We do not have inspiration data for "{country}" yet.
country.title: Travel to {country}
country.description: Everything you need to plan your trip to {country} - best months to visit, popular itineraries, and travel tips.
country.comingSoonDescription: Detailed guides for {country} - including city breakdowns, cultural tips, visa information, and curated multi-day itineraries - are on the way.

shareUnavailable.title: This shared trip is no longer available
shareUnavailable.description: The link may have expired or was deactivated by the trip owner. Please ask for a fresh link or create your own trip to continue planning.

notFound.headline: Looks like this page is already on vacation!
notFound.missingPrompt: Think this page should exist and we missed it?
